name: RoadCode
0:
”Alexa, open road code”
”Alexa, open road code and start a test”
”Alexa, ask road code to start a test”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: road code
des:
New Zealand Road Code Test Simulator is a fun and easy way to test your knowledge of the road code and/or prepare for a theory test.

The test consists of 35 different multiple choice questions and each correct questions will add one point to your final score.

Bear in mind that to pass a real test you need to score at least 32 points.

Some questions require you to look at the picture to understand the situation in the question.

If you need to look at the picture to understand the situation in the question better - please refer to your Alexa mobile app or run the skill on the devices with the screen.

Online version of the test can be found at https://alanrsoares.github.io/the-roadcode-quiz/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
